name: Tangy Fish Tacos

ingredients.name: Creamy Potato Salad Dressing Mix or Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
white fish
ingredients.additionalInstruction: such as tilapia, cod, or haddock, about 4 fillets

preparation: Whisk together olive oil, apple cider vinegar, and dressing mix. Add coleslaw mix. Toss to combine. Set aside.
Place fish in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave  on high 3 min.
Remove fish from microwave; let stand, covered, 1 min. Drain excess liquid from steamer.
Break fish into small chunks with fork; add mustard and mix well. Divide fish between tortillas. Top with coleslaw and other toppings, if desired.
tips: Use the 4-in-1 Mandoline to thinly shave toppings such as radish. Try it with onion too.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup veggies and 1 tbsp of your favourite Epicure dip.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
